about_the_game:
'The Tainted Lands' is 2d turn-based tactical RPG which is inspired by classic RPGs.

The mountainous region located at the northeastern tip of the Numan Empire has long been called as the Forbidden Lands among the indigenous people.
It is a sinister land that holds the eldritch secrets of a ancient dark age, and in pre-imperial times it was guarded by a mysterious order of druid guardians.

Now, as a wanderer seeking a cure for a terrible affliction, you must enter the Forbidden Lands and find the clues that will save you.
But this place is dangerous and harmful to travel alone. Only a well-armed unit operating under careful planning can make an expedition successful.

Gather your party for venture forth, and traverse a forbidden land to discover mysterious places.
Face off against abominable monsters and collect powerful artifacts.

And in the end, confront a strange and horrifying conspiracy unfolding in this tainted land.

[Features]

* Choices matters impacting the story
* Detailed hand drawn arts.
* Diverse recruitable characters and monsters.
* Intensive turn-based tactical combat.
* Limited permadeath.
* Various character development systems.

short_description: 'The Tainted Lands' is a classic 2D turn-based RPG about an epic adventure in world of dark and eldritch horrors. You must gather allies, explore the wilderness where the secrets of the past dark ages lie dormant, and slay the unspeakable horrors.
